attributes.review: i downloaded this app in attempts in finding a reason to not hate Trump. but i wasn’t surprised when i couldn’t find a reason. this app is absolutely disgraceful and disgusting. DONT VOTE FOR TRUMP he is a racist sexist ignorant loser.
attributes.title: don’t get the app and don’t vote for Trump

attributes.review: I try joining the app it glitches me out it has only worked once and that one time it gave me no reasons why I should vote for trump or provide any good evidence I do not recommend this app.
attributes.title: It’s so bad.

attributes.review: Whoever votes for Trump is either a redneck or a dummy you can’t blame rednecks because they live in a country with no touch of modern time and Dummies they’re just dumb they don’t have the capability to learn simple common sense.
attributes.title: Black Lives Matter

attributes.review: App is complete trash, not only did it take away most of my data but also took way too long for me to redeem anything. This was a waste of my good time🙄😒
attributes.title: Don’t get this app

attributes.review: This app freezes and crashes SO much & I can’t do anything on it. If freezes and makes my phone restart??? How does that even happen?
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: It took 3 hours for the app to download on my phone. Then when I got on it it was being glitchy and now my phone won’t turn on.
attributes.title: Glitchy

attributes.review: This app did nothing for me but emphasize why I will NOT be voting for trump for the second time in a row. This thing glitches more than my dad’s Apple computer from the early 2000s. Don’t get it.
attributes.title: Absolute trash

attributes.review: Asks for a lot of info and my phone started slowing down and heating up as soon as I downloaded it. Deleted. Worried it left stuff on my phone!!! #deepstate
attributes.title: Feel like it is harvesting my data

attributes.review: It was so horrible there was so much glitches to the point where my phone couldn’t handle it, i dint recommend downloading this app is has no worth.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and opened it to only be welcomed with awful music. That music then made my dog so scared that he dashed outside the house 😢 I really wanted to see what it’s about, but I got to go find my dog now 🐾
attributes.title: Awful
